title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Hikes Interest Rates By 25 Bps On Platina Fixed Deposits - Goodreturns
content: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Hikes Interest Rates By 25 Bps On Platina Fixed Deposits  Goodreturns
description: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank has hiked interest rates on Platina fixed deposits. Interest rates on Platina fixed deposits have been raised by Ujjivan Small Finance Bank. The announcement was made today, May 1, 2022, and as a result of the modification, the bank has increased the interest rate on deposits maturing in 12 months from 6.65 percent to 6.90 percent, a 25-basis-point increase.
